## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are completed before requesting review -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security

- [ ] I have reviewed my code for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No secrets or credentials are committed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented where applicable
- [ ] XSS/SQL injection/Command injection prevention is in place
- [ ] Dependencies are up to date and have no known vulnerabilities

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the CLAUDE.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in /docs (if needed)
- [ ] I have added/updated code comments and docstrings
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md

### Git

- [ ] My commits follow the conventional commits specification
- [ ] My branch is up to date with the main branch
- [ ] I have rebased my branch (if requested)
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
